ygData.subject: Where to go at my level?
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wondering if anyone could tell me where I should be hunting as a level 12 bard. Ever since level 8 I ve been in Steamfront killing skeles and clockworks.
ygData.messageBody:
I was wondering if anyone could tell me where I should be hunting as a level 12 bard. Ever since level 8 I've been in Steamfront killing skeles and clockworks. Now everything con's green (except for mino's, and they're usually heavily camped). Where should I be hunting now? Crushbone is way too overpopulated, on Tarew Marr at least. I just need somewhere to hunt until I hit 14 then I'll go to Unrest. Thanks for any help.

Tanthalias
Half Elven Bard, 12th Level
Tarew Marr
